snippet: Four friends from Brooklyn were making holiday plans at Mission Chinese Food, which serves free beer while you wait for a table.
abstract: Scene at Mission Chinese Food, Lower East Side restaurant that is a spinoff of a San Francisco establishment, described as four friends from Brooklyn dine.
lead_paragraph: Four friends from Brooklyn were making holiday plans at Mission Chinese Food, which serves free beer while you wait for a table.
